testcase.classname: Adactin practicse application end to end testing
testcase.name: Launch hotel reservation application and checking the upcoming check in and check out dates
testcase.system-out: Given Launch hotel reservation application..................................passed When User enter the username "rathipriya" in the username field.............passed And User enter the password "rathi143" in the password field................passed And User click on the login button..........................................passed And User select the location in the list....................................passed And User select the available hotels in the list............................passed And User select the roomtype in the list....................................passed And User select the number of rooms in the list.............................passed And User select the check in date as "03/07/2019"...........................passed And User select the check out date as "01/07/2019"..........................passed And User click on the search button to check the Availablity of the selected hotel.passed Then Verify that system gives an error saying check-in-date should not be later than check-out-date.passed
